Name: Arús
Named after: Founder , freethinker and philanthropist Rossend Arús

Name: Camp de l'Arpa - Caterina Albert

Name: Can Rosés
Named after: The 18th century masia where it 's located

Name: Clarà
Named after: The sculptor Josep Clarà , who used it as his atelier

Name: Fort Pienc
Named after: A former military citadel called Fort Pienc

Name: Francesca Bonnemaison
Locality: Sant Pere , Santa Caterina i la Ribera
Named after: Francesca Bonnemaison , founder of the first women 's library in Europe

Name: Ignasi Iglésias - Can Fabra
Named after: Writer Ignasi Iglésias , and the former factory Can Fabra
